item.title: 长短数据格式转换
item.description: Wide to long 1 gather(data, key, value, ..., na.rm = FALSE, convert = FALSE) data: The dataset to be modified (in our case, seps) key: the name of the new “naming” variable (year) value: the name of the new “result” variable (value) na.rm: whether missing values are removed (this dataset doesn’
